name: prysm-pyrmont.dnp.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Prysm pyrmont ETH2.0 Beacon chain + validator
description: Validate with prysm: a Go implementation of the Ethereum 2.0 Serenity protocol and open source project created by Prysmatic Labs. Beacon node which powers the beacon chain at the core of Ethereum 2.0
